long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Let's get more productive!

This Chrome extension interacts with your favourite web-based platforms and will add extra functionality: 
- export the data you select as PDF and Excel
- add extra buttons to your screen to generate a dynamic e-mail based on the data visible on your screen
- hide unnecessary components on your screen 
- ...

All these options will make you more focused on the content you really need, and make you more productive!

In our privacy policy you can read we will not copy or sell the selected data you export;

We Do Web, Yes We Do !
